DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study evaluate effect vision six month daily dose 5 mg tadalafil 50 mg sildenafil compare placebo .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Visual Effects Erectile Dysfunction Medications Dosed Daily Six Months
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject males mild erectile dysfunction ( ED ) . Between age 30 65 year , inclusive . Phosphodiesterase type 5 ( PDE5 ) inhibitor therapy ( tadalafil , sildenafil , vardenafil ) within 6 week start study . Diagnosis diabetes mellitus . Any chronic illness medication risk factor eye disease medication cause retinal toxicity affect visual function . Certain chronic medical condition include unstable angina pectoris , severe renal [ kidney ] insufficiency , clinically significant hepatobiliary [ liver , bile duct ] disease , cancer , AIDS/HIV . A history clinically significant chronic ophthalmologic disease significant visual abnormality identify start study .
